name: Nightscape
description:
Nightscape is an infinite runner/platformer set in an urban environment at night. See how far you can run while taking in the atmosphere!

Controls:
Up Arrow/Space Bar = Jump
Left/Right Arrow = Move
Escape = Exit Game

Nightscape was developed by Fire collective. The project was lead by Jack Veselovski and supported by Judy Mao, Samantha Ding, Red Liang and Isaac Jiang. All artwork assets used in the game were created by members of the collective. All sound assets used in the game were downloaded from freesound.org and OpenGameArt.org
